docs.text:
• Mechanical Engineering at National Taiwan University, 2021~now
  • Hsinchu Senior High School, 2018~2021

docs.title: Project
docs.text:
In my undergraduate studies, I have developed a strong foundation on natural language processing (NLP) in NTU speech processing lab.

  • Test-Time Adaptation for Speech Recognition
  • Spoken language model

docs.title: Teaching Assistant
docs.text:
I have worked as a teaching assistant for a course on introduction to generative AI, where I designed assignments on topics such as supervised fine-tuning (SFT) and reinforcement learning with human feedback (RLHF).

Homework link SFT RLHF
